scripts.build: if [ "$RAILWAY_SERVICE_NAME" = "space-tetris-api" ]; then cd space-tetris/backend && npm install; else cd stock-analysis-dashboard/backend && npm install; fi
scripts.start: if [ "$RAILWAY_SERVICE_NAME" = "space-tetris-api" ]; then cd space-tetris/backend && node server.js; else cd stock-analysis-dashboard/backend && node server.js; fi
